emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fifteen South Hills High School basketball players, kneeling, left to right: John Bolla, Ray Sineway, John Carr, Henry Hemphill, Paul Rue and John Patterson; standing: Harry Guldatti, Tony Jeffries, Ken wade, Cal Jones, Paul Dorsett, Coach Bruce J. Weston, Carl Wade, Ulna Calloway, Jack Kress, and Andy Dick
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 4, 1961, pg. 28 reads: "South Hills High School Cage Squad - Leading the spirited race in Section 2, of the 1960 City Basketball competition, at the half way mark, these "Tunnelites" have designs on the big 1961 local crown. Kneeling, left to right are: John Bolla, Ray Sineway, John Carr, Henry Hemphill, Paul Rue and John Patterson.  Standing, are: Harry Guldatti, Tony Jeffries, Ken wade, Cal Jones, Paul Dorsett, Coach Bruce J. Weston ,Carl Wade, Ulna Calloway, Jack Kress and Andy Dick. - Harris Photo."
